Package view

Class TileIcon

java.lang.Object
view.TileIcon
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.swing.Icon
public class TileIcon
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.swing.Icon
An icon that contains a Reversi piece.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    TileIcon​(Tile tile, int width)
    Constructs an icon for this Tile with the given width.
    TileIcon​(Tile tile, int width, java.awt.Color backgroundColor)
    Constructs an icon for this Tile with the given width and given background color

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void fastFlip​(javax.swing.JComponent comp)
    Flip this piece with no animation
    void flip​(javax.swing.JComponent comp)
    Flip this piece with an animation (this takes about .5 seconds)
    int getIconHeight()  
    int getIconWidth()  
    void paintIcon​(java.awt.Component c, java.awt.Graphics g, int x, int y)
    Paints this tile.
    void placePiece​(Tile piece)
    Place a piece on this tile (may be empty, which clears the tile).
    void setBackgroundColor​(java.awt.Color backgroundColor)
    Sets the background color for this tile.
